title: 服务器op之外的人都没法圈地 怎么解决
author: Goomi

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
路径：/plugins/residence/config.yml
   右键编辑，找到OnlyAdmin字样，把后面的true改成false，之后保存文件并重启服务端。

replies.author: Goomi
